changed_files.diff:
diff --git a/framework/py/flwr/superexec/exec_servicer.py b/framework/py/flwr/superexec/exec_servicer.py
index 954bf200c..4ff6f1577 100644
--- a/framework/py/flwr/superexec/exec_servicer.py
+++ b/framework/py/flwr/superexec/exec_servicer.py
@@ -50,6 +50,7 @@ from flwr.proto.exec_pb2 import (  # pylint: disable=E0611
 from flwr.server.superlink.ffs.ffs_factory import FfsFactory
 from flwr.server.superlink.linkstate import LinkState, LinkStateFactory
 
+from .exec_user_auth_interceptor import shared_account_info
 from .executor import Executor
 
 
@@ -75,10 +76,12 @@ class ExecServicer(exec_pb2_grpc.ExecServicer):
         """Create run ID."""
         log(INFO, "ExecServicer.StartRun")
 
+        flwr_aid = shared_account_info.get().flwr_aid if self.auth_plugin else None
         run_id = self.executor.start_run(
             request.fab.content,
             user_config_from_proto(request.override_config),
             config_record_from_proto(request.federation_options),
+            flwr_aid,
         )
 
         if run_id is None:

diff --git a/framework/py/flwr/superexec/exec_servicer_test.py b/framework/py/flwr/superexec/exec_servicer_test.py
index fe6eae559..f1fd3e66d 100644
--- a/framework/py/flwr/superexec/exec_servicer_test.py
+++ b/framework/py/flwr/superexec/exec_servicer_test.py
@@ -47,7 +47,7 @@ def test_start_run() -> None:
         run_res.proc = proc
 
     executor = MagicMock()
-    executor.start_run = lambda _, __, ___, ____: run_res.run_id
+    executor.start_run.return_value = run_res.run_id
 
     context_mock = MagicMock()

diff --git a/framework/py/flwr/superexec/executor.py b/framework/py/flwr/superexec/executor.py
index c7c096a4b..483202f51 100644
--- a/framework/py/flwr/superexec/executor.py
+++ b/framework/py/flwr/superexec/executor.py
@@ -90,7 +90,8 @@ class Executor(ABC):
         federation_options: ConfigRecord
             The federation options sent by the user (using `flwr run`).
         flwr_aid : Optional[str]
-            The ID of the user starting the run, if authentication is enabled.
+            The Flower Account ID of the user starting the run, if authentication is
+            enabled.
 
         Returns
         -------
